reg_info.act_under: Employment Standards Act   Loi sur les normes d’emploi

content.content: 1. (1) An employer who is required to give notice of termination under subsection 57 (2) of the Act shall provide to the Minister, (a) the information indicated in Form 1; and (b) a copy of any adjustment plan negotiated under section 41.1 of the Labour Relations Act. O. Reg. 361/94, s. 1. (2) The employer shall provide the information required under subsection (1) to the Minister by delivering it to the Director of the Employment Practices Branch of the Ministry between 9 a.m. and 5 p.m. from Monday to Friday. O. Reg. 361/94, s. 1. (3) The employer shall post Part A of Form 1 and the information required by clause (1) (b) in accordance with subsection 57 (4) of the Act. O. Reg. 361/94, s. 1.
content.raw_html:
1. (1) An employer who is required to give notice of termination under subsection 57 (2) of the Act shall provide to the Minister,

(a) the information indicated in Form 1; and

(b) a copy of any adjustment plan negotiated under section 41.1 of the Labour Relations Act. O. Reg. 361/94, s. 1.

(2) The employer shall provide the information required under subsection (1) to the Minister by delivering it to the Director of the Employment Practices Branch of the Ministry between 9 a.m. and 5 p.m. from Monday to Friday. O. Reg. 361/94, s. 1.

(3) The employer shall post Part A of Form 1 and the information required by clause (1) (b) in accordance with subsection 57 (4) of the Act. O. Reg. 361/94, s. 1.

content.content: 2. A notice under subsection 6 (2) of the Act shall be in Form 2. R.R.O. 1990, Reg. 323, s. 2.
